thread.title: This Powerpuff Girls Make-Up Collection Is A Dream Come True
thread.title_full: This Powerpuff Girls Make-Up Collection Is A Dream Come True

title: This Powerpuff Girls Make-Up Collection Is A Dream Come True
text:
facebook 114 SHARES 
Remember how we spoke about Harry Potter make-up being the real deal. Well, now Korean beauty brands, Peripera, has something for the â€˜90s girls. If you loved Cartoon Network , chances are you have fond memories of three kindergarten students by the names of Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup. Nothing compared to watching The Powerpuff Girls as they defended Townsville, and fought their enemy, MojoJojo. To our delight Periepra has transformed our memories into a beauty line. Exciting isn't it? Here is what the collection contains. Hand cream 
It has all three of them features on the packaging. Pick one after your favourite character. We love Bubbles. Lip stain 
We love lip stains, and even more when they come in such cute bottles. Eyeshadow palettes 
Did you ever even dream of wearing an eyeshadow inspired by your favourite Powerpuff Girl? We didn't. Cushion compacts 
We just have to get our hands on these. Cushion compacts are already having a huge moment, and when they come packaged like this, you want them even more. Mascara 
Oh, even your eyelashes are in for a treat. 
You can find all these products here .Or book a trip to Seoul, maybe?
